name: Complete Project Report
description: Finalize the project report and submit it for review. Ensure all sections are complete, including diagrams and charts.

name: Team Meeting for Milestone Review
description: Schedule a meeting with the development team to review progress on the current milestone and set targets for the next phase.

name: Code Review and Testing
description: Perform a thorough review of the recent code submissions and test for bugs or potential issues in the new feature implementations.

name: Client Presentation Preparation
description: Prepare slides and talking points for the client presentation. Focus on project milestones and upcoming deliverables.

name: Database Optimization
description: Optimize the database queries and structure to improve performance, particularly on the reports generation page.

name: UI/UX Feedback Session
description: Conduct a feedback session with the design team to gather insights on the latest UI/UX updates and user interactions.

name: API Integration for Payment Gateway
description: Integrate the payment gateway API with the application and ensure all transactions are processed securely and efficiently.
